Description: Saudi Chemical is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2002. It operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia and Egypt. Saudi Chemical is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in March 1972.
